name: Dragon Warrior I & II
description:
Explore the beginnings of the RPG genre with Dragon Warrior I & II. This cartridge--containing two full RPG games--is a great value, providing more than 40 hours of gameplay!

In Dragon Warrior I, you as the descendant of legendary hero Loto must save the land of Alefgard from the villainous schemes of the DracoLord. Solve sub-quests, discover ancient treasure, and learn a variety of spells you can use to dispatch your foes. You can also explore a large world containing several towns and dungeons, where you never know what could be lurking in the shadows.

In Dragon Warrior II, a new evil has reared its ugly head. Hargon, a ruthless barbarian, now threatens the peace of three different kingdoms. Three heroes, each a descendant of the first game's hero, step forward to oppose him. Dragon Warrior II features many new spells, monsters, and items to collect, as well as a much larger world filled with even more danger.

Both games feature enhanced graphics and a new easy-to-use interface. Dragon Warrior I & II is a single-player adventure and features battery backup to save up to three quests per game.
